FuncDef: This command sets the time, in seconds, the router wants the LSPs it originates to be considered valid by other routers in the domain.

ParaDef.Info: The time, in seconds, that the router wants the LSPs it originates to be considered valid by other routers in the domain. Values-350 to 65535.

ExtraInfo: Default: lsp-lifetime 1200 - LSPs originated by the router should be valid for 1200 seconds (20 minutes).
